mapper.select: select count(*) from (select mem.mem_seq , mem.id , mem.name , mem.hp_no , mem.email , mem.reg_dtm , mem.mod_dtm , mem.mem_cd , mem.work_bsnm_no , mem.gndr , case when mst.mod_cd ='AD' then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mst.reg_id) when mst.mod_cd = 'CO' then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mst.reg_id) else null end as mod_name , cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.size_cd ) as size_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd ) as ctgry_cd_nm , cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd from co_mem_mst mem inner join ( select mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , reg_id from co_mem_mod_log where ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq) in ( select max(mem_mod_seq) , mem_seq from co_mem_mod_log group by mem_seq ) ) mst on mem.mem_seq = mst.mem_seq left outer join co_mem_cmpn_rel cmpn_rel on mem.mem_seq = cmpn_rel.mem_seq and mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no left outer join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst on cmpn_mst.bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no ) as ma

SELECT mm.*, cm.bsnm_no, cm.cmpn_nm, cm.rprsnt_nm, cm.ctgry_cd, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = cm.ctgry_cd) ctgry_cd_nm, /* 구분 */ cm.size_cd, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = cm.size_cd) size_cd_nm, /* 규모 */ cm.stbsm_dt, cm.tel_no as comp_tel, /* 회사 전화번호 */ cm.zipcode, cm.bsc_addr, cm.dtl_addr, cm.sls_pmt, cm.qlty_5_star_cd, YEAR(cm.qlty_5_star_year) as qlty_5_star_year, cm.pay_5_star_cd, YEAR(cm.pay_5_star_year) as pay_5_star_year, cm.tchlg_5_star_cd, YEAR(cm.tchlg_5_star_year) as tchlg_5_star_year, YEAR(cm.sls_year) as sls_year, cm.mple_cnt, cm.mjr_prdct_1, cm.mjr_prdct_2, cm.mjr_prdct_3 FROM (SELECT mem_seq, id, name, email, dept_cd, dept_dtl_nm, pstn_cd, pstn_nm, hp_no, tel_no, work_bsnm_no FROM co_mem_mst WHERE mem_seq = #{selPartUser} AND mem_cd = #{memCd} ) as mm INNER JOIN cp_cmpn_mst cm ON mm.work_bsnm_no = cm.bsnm_no;

sql.where:
and ma.mem_cd = #{memCd}
and ma.reg_dtm >= str_to_date(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and ma.reg_dtm < date_add(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
and ma.mod_dtm >= str_to_date(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and ma.mod_dtm < date_add(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
and (
ma.ctgry_cd = #{ctgryCdList}
)
and ma.id like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and ma.name like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and ma.hp_no like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and ma.email like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and (ma.mod_name like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )
and (ma.cmpn_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )
and (ma.work_bsnm_no like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )
and ( ma.id like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.name like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.hp_no like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.email like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.mod_name like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.cmpn_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or ma.work_bsnm_no like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )
